title: How to Delete a Doordash Account

steps.title: Go to https://help.doordash.com/consumers/s/contactsupport.
steps.content: Go to https://help.doordash.com/consumers/s/contactsupport . You can use either a desktop or mobile web browser to cancel your DoorDash account. If you just want to cancel your DashPass subscription, see this method . If you're a Dasher, the process is the same except you need to remove all your scheduled shifts from DoorDash. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fill out the Contact Us form.
steps.content: Fill out the Contact Us form. You'll see a fillable form on the left side of the page while the right side of the page has answers to frequently asked questions. Enter your full name, email, and phone number. You'll need to provide accurate information here so the DoorDash customer service team can find your account. Choose Account Settings for Category . Choose None for Subcategory . Type Request to deactivate DoorDash account into the Description text box.

steps.title: Click Submit.
steps.content: Click Submit . You'll find this orange button below the form. This submits your request to DoorDash. A representative will contact you once your account is canceled. The representative may request further information before canceling your account. Answer any questions promptly to ensure your account is deleted quickly.

steps.title: Open Doordash or go to https://www.doordash.com/.
steps.content: Open Doordash or go to https://www.doordash.com/ . You can cancel your DashPass subscription from the website or mobile app. If you have a monthly subscription, you have to cancel 1 day before the renewal date to avoid being charged for another month. [2] X Research source Once you cancel a monthly subscription, you can continue using DashPass features until the final date in the current billing cycle. If you cancel a yearly subscription before using DashPass, you'll receive a full refund. If you've used DashPass at all, you will not be eligible for a refund.

steps.title: Tap ☰ or the account icon.
steps.content: Tap ☰ or the account icon. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap or click Manage DashPass (mobile) or DashPass (web).
steps.content: Tap or click Manage DashPass (mobile) or DashPass (web). You'll see information about your DashPass subscription, such as when it's renewing and when you signed up.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm your cancellation.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm your cancellation. After confirm the cancelation, you can continue using DashPass through the last day of the current billing cycle. You will not be billed for DashPass again. [3] X Research source
